mapper.select: SELECT a.EQUP_CODE , a.EQUIPMENT_ID , a.EQUIPMENT_NAME , a.CENTER_ID , a.REG_DATE , a.COMPANY , a.REMARK , a.USE_YN , EQUIP_STATE FROM tb_equipmentinfo a WHERE a.EQUP_CODE = #{equpCode}

SELECT a.EQUP_CODE , a.EQUIPMENT_ID , a.EQUIPMENT_NAME , a.CENTER_ID , a.SWC_SEQ , a.REG_DATE , a.COMPANY , a.CNT , a.REMARK , a.USE_YN , CASE a.SWC_SEQ WHEN NULL then '좌석없음' ELSE (SELECT SEAT_NAME FROM tb_swc_room e where a.SWC_SEQ = e.SWC_SEQ) END seatNm , a.EQUP_INDATE , d.CENTER_NM , a.EQUIP_SERIAL FROM TB_EQUIPMENTINFO a, TB_CENTERINFO d WHERE EQUP_CODE = #{equpCode} AND a.CENTER_ID = d.CENTER_ID

SELECT a.EQUP_CODE , a.EQUIPMENT_ID , a.EQUIPMENT_NAME , a.EQUIP_STATE , a.EQUIP_SERIAL , fn_DetailCodeNm(a.EQUIP_STATE) EQUIP_STATE_TXT FROM TB_EQUIPMENTINFO a WHERE a.EQUP_CODE IN
#{equpList}
